arts.ttl: Woltemade admits Stuttgart gave result away too easily
arts.sum: Stuttgart striker Nick Woltemade pulled no punches as he reacted to Stuttgart's 2-1 loss against Wolfsburg.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg snatch victory with late comeback against VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Wolfsburg staged a dramatic comeback to defeat VfB Stuttgart 2-1 at the MHPArena in a thrilling Bundesliga encounter and boost their hopes of securing European football this season. Intense action in the Stuttgart penalty area as both teams battled for supremacy in a tight first half - IMAGO/Pressefoto Rudel/Robin Rudel

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Big wins for Bochum and Gladbach, Wolfsburg and Freiburg snatch late winners
arts.sum: Across the Bundesliga this afternoon, Bochum picked up a fantastic derby win against Borussia Dortmund, whilst Borussia MÃ¶nchengladbach, Wolfsburg and Freiburg all took three points.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart set to sign teenage talent away from Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Germany's preeminent footballing publication reports that TSG 1899 Hoffenheim are set to lose one of their homegrown talents to VfB Stuttgart.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs Wolfsburg preview: European chasers go head-to-head
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart prepare to take on fellow European hopefuls Wolfsburg at MHPArena on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Preview: Stuttgart vs. Wolfsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Stuttgart and Wolfsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
